name: Infinix Smart 7 Plus -x6517 - 6.6 " – 64gb Rom-3gb Ram- 13/ 5 Mp Camera- 6000 Mah- Green
description:
Infinix Smart 7 Plus 64GB-3GB
“Infinix Smart 7 Plus 64GB-4GB, The Ultimate Budget Smartphone with Premium Features”. The Infinix Smart 7 boasts a large 6.6″ HD+ display that provides a vivid and immersive viewing experience. The 20:9 aspect ratio provides a taller and narrower screen that’s perfect for watching videos and browsing the web. The dot-in display design adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to the phone’s design while still providing a bezel-less look that maximizes the screen size.
Overall, the Infinix Smart 7 is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a  smartphone with good features and performance.
Pro-Level Camera, Affordable Price
The New Smart 7 has 13MP + AI Lens back camera that provides stunning photos, while the selfie camera is 5MP at the front with features like AI Scene Detection, Super Night Mode, and a dedicated macro camera, the Infinix Smart 7 allows you to capture  without breaking the bank.
Battery
Smart 7 Plus comes with a 6 non-removable battery that will keep you entertained and connected for longer. With its sleek design and cutting-edge features,

name: Nokia 105 Africa Edition - Dual Sim - 4MB Rom - 4MB Ram - 800mAh - Blue
description:
Nokia 105 Africa Edition A durable phone to help you stay in touch and stay entertained.
Discover the phone that’s built to be loved – with a molded design that’s scratch and bump resistant and available in a range of colors. An FM wireless radio lets you listen on the move, and the all-day battery life¹ will let you talk for hours.
A built-in torch will ensure you never get caught in the dark, and there’s enough storage capacity for 2,000 contacts and 500 SMS. Plus, 10 preloaded games – including classic Snake – will keep you entertained.
Stay tuned: FM wireless radio for listening on the move Super storage: Capacity for 2000 contacts and 500 SMS Everyday essentials: Built-in torch and an all-day battery Classic games: 10 pre-loaded games, including Snake A radio in your pocket Whatever you like to listen to, an FM wireless radio will give you the freedom to tune-in to music, sport, news and broadcasts, wherever, whenever.
Battery life
Single charge. Plenty of talking. We all love to chat with friends and family. That’s why Nokia 105 comes with a battery that lets you talk for hours, on a single charge – and when you need to recharge, there’s a handy Micro USB charger.
Color and contour
Vibrant colors, robust design The Nokia 105 is molded to fit snugly in your hand. It’s robust too, and comes in a range of X vibrant colors: X, Y, and Z.
Let’s play Who said a phone was just for staying in touch? Unwind in style with 10 classic pre-loaded games, and let the fun begin.
Built-in torch
Light the way Shine on with a handy built-in torch – you’ll never get caught in the dark again.

The Tecno Spark 10C is a powerful smartphone designed to provide an exceptional user experience. Featuring a large 6.6-inch HD+ display, dual rear cameras, a robust Octa-Core processor, and a massive 5000mAh battery, this device offers excellent value for money and is perfect for anyone looking for a reliable and high-performing smartphone.
Featuring a large 6.6-inch HD+ display, the Tecno Spark 10C delivers stunning visuals and vibrant colors, making it perfect for streaming your favorite shows or playing the latest games. With its robust Octa-Core processor, 128GB of internal storage, and 4GB of RAM, you can enjoy seamless multitasking and storage of all your important files and apps.
Capture every moment in exquisite detail with the Tecno Spark 10C’s dual rear camera system, featuring a 16MP primary camera and a 2MP depth sensor. The 8MP front-facing camera is ideal for stunning selfies and clear video calls.
Never run out of power with the Tecno Spark 10C’s massive 5000mAh battery. With fast charging support, you can quickly top up your battery and get back to using your phone for extended periods without interruption.
Overall, the Tecno Spark 10C is a fantastic smartphone that offers excellent value for money. Whether you’re a student, professional, or tech enthusiast, this device delivers exceptional performance and impressive camera features, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking for a reliable and powerful smartphone.

name: Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus 5g - 6.7" - 128GB ROM - 8GB RAM - Single Sim - 4500mAh - Pouch & Screen Guard - Black
description:
SAMSUNG S20+ Brains, beauty, and a whole lot of power
Not afraid of water WATER-RESISTANT Stands up to 1.5 meters of water for up to 30 minutes
Cinema-quality viewing that fits in the palm of your hand Bezels are pushed way back and there's no notch — just a minuscule camera hole. The HDR10+ certified Infinity-O Display offers a big, immersive screen with limited onscreen interruptions.
ALL-DAY BATTERY Power on and on and on… Samsung batteries are not just powerful but also intelligent, adjusting to your mobile habits to save power and last way longer on a single charge.
image
STORAGE The space to store your favorite photos and videos Galaxy S20, S20+, and S20 Ultra come with vast storage built-in for all your high-resolution videos and photos. You can then expand it with a microSD card for even more storage — over 1TB total

Plus Free Galaxy Buds & Screen Repair

name: Nokia 105 Africa Edition - Dual Sim - 4MB Rom - 4MB Ram - 800mAh - Charcoal
description:
Nokia 105 Africa Edition A durable phone to help you stay in touch and stay entertained.
Discover the phone that’s built to be loved – with a molded design that’s scratch and bump resistant and available in a range of colors. An FM wireless radio lets you listen on the move, and the all-day battery life¹ will let you talk for hours.
A built-in torch will ensure you never get caught in the dark, and there’s enough storage capacity for 2,000 contacts and 500 SMS. Plus, 10 preloaded games – including classic Snake – will keep you entertained.
Stay tuned: FM wireless radio for listening on the move Super storage: Capacity for 2000 contacts and 500 SMS Everyday essentials: Built-in torch and an all-day battery Classic games: 10 pre-loaded games, including Snake A radio in your pocket Whatever you like to listen to, an FM wireless radio will give you the freedom to tune-in to music, sport, news and broadcasts, wherever, whenever.
Battery life
Single charge. Plenty of talking. We all love to chat with friends and family. That’s why Nokia 105 comes with a battery that lets you talk for hours, on a single charge – and when you need to recharge, there’s a handy Micro USB charger.
Color and contour
Vibrant colors, robust design The Nokia 105 is molded to fit snugly in your hand. It’s robust too, and comes in a range of X vibrant colors: X, Y, and Z.
Let’s play Who said a phone was just for staying in touch? Unwind in style with 10 classic pre-loaded games, and let the fun begin.
Built-in torch
Light the way Shine on with a handy built-in torch – you’ll never get caught in the dark again.

name: Atouch X19 Life 5G Tablet PC With Keyboard - 10" - 512GB ROM - 8GB RAM - Dual SIM - 6000mAh - Gold
description:
The All-New Atouch X19 Life is a special Tablet PC with a Dual Sim card slot and WiFi. A tablet produced to meet your child's educational needs, and also your business needs. This Premium Educational Tablet has a decent look and it is a very nice tablet made with special material of metal and plastic, designed to slim and can be used by adults as well. This Android Tablet has an Android version of 12, The tablet features large, bright, and colorful icons on a 10.1-inch IPS Screen letting the user navigate quickly. It has a touchscreen with ten-point touch support.
The Quad-Core 1.3GHZ along with 512GB of internal storage and 8GB of RAM, makes this a highly capable tablet. WiFi facilitates easy connectivity of this tablet to different devices and calls to your beloved people by using Dual Sim cards. Let your child develop an early understanding of computer devices through the use of this tablet. X19 Life is a Premium model because of its high quality and awesome performance as it's designed with a Quad-Core processor.
The software inbuilt is Android 12 and it is able to run all the applications and games no matter what are you using your tablet for. To entertain your kids it's the best choice with a 6000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery. With a simple cable, you will be able to hook various OTG extensions and USB devices. The X19 Life has 3 rear cameras to capture your photos beautifully. To watch videos with good colors you can enjoy 1280*800 10-inch IPS built-in. In general, the Atouch X19 Life tablet is an Edutainment system for you and your family.
SPECIFICATIONS Model : X19 Life Operating System: AndroidOS Version: Android 12 Screen Size: 10.1 inch Screen Type: IPS Connectivity: WiFi, Bluetooth, USB Storage: 512GB RAM: 8GB Processor Type: Quad-Core Camera: Dual-Camera (Front/Back) Media Ports: Memory Card MicroSD up to 64GB USB: Micro USB v2.0 Battery: 6000MAH Built-In Lithium battery
WHAT’S IN THE BOX Android tablet Comes with Mouse and free gifts Bluetooth earphone protective film and keyboard holster

description:
For Magsafe External Battery Magnetic Power Bank For iphone 11 11pro 12 12Pro 12proMax 12mini 13 13pro 13 pro max 13mini Magnet Wireless Charging Fast Charger
Product Name: magnetic wireless power bank 5W general charge Type-C port input 5v2a USB output 5v2.1a
Wireless charging 5W Size: 98 * 63 * 15mm Electric quantity display: four electric quantity Weight: 120g 15W PD fast charge Product size: 98 * 63 * 15mm Capacity: 5000mAh; Key: Click to open; Electric quantity display: four electric quantity + one wireless charging indicator Type-C input / output PD: 5V / 3a, 9V / 2a, 12V / 1.5A USB output: 5V / 3a, 9V / 2a, 12V / 1.5A Wireless charging and output: 15W (compatible with 10W / 7.5W / 5W)
Attaching the MagSafe Battery Pack is a snap. Its compact, intuitive design makes on-the-go charging easy. The perfectly aligned magnets keep it attached to your iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro or iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Pro — providing safe and reliable wireless charging. And it automatically charges, so there’s no need to turn it on or off. There’s no interference with your credit cards or key fobs either.

At your desk and need a charge? Just plug a Lightning cable into the MagSafe Battery Pack for up to 15W of wireless charging. Short on time? With a higher than 20W power adapter, you can charge both the MagSafe Battery Pack and your iPhone even faster. And you can track the status of your charge on the Lock Screen.

Recommended:
– 20W or higher USB-C Power Adapter and USB-C to Lightning Cable (sold separately)

name: Smart Watch T55 Pro Max With Earpads & Extra Strap For Android & iPhone With Health
description:
This is smart watch t55pro max which comes with a lot features such as -making calls -picking calls too from the connected phone through it -check the phonebook( contact list) - call logs ( missed calls, dial calls, and also received calls )
it can also serve as a health tracking device because it has the ability to -read blood pressure -read the heart rate -check calories and also count steps it can also serve as a notifying device for some of the app on the connected phone ( apps like) -facebook - whatsapp - instagram -twitter and also gmail too. etc
it has some amazing features like -wallpaper choice display -alarm -stopwatch -thermometer -music player -camera -find phone some of the amazing advantages about this watch is that it comes with an extra strap and an airpod note* delivery 2000 within payment on within lagos accepted
Make and receive phone calls with this Bluetooth T500 Smart Watch Heart Rate Blood Pressure Fitness Smart Watch. This smartwatch is a watch with multi-functional features. A smartwatch is a watch with information processing capability that meets the basic technical requirements of a watch. In addition to indicating the time, a smartwatch should also have one or more functions such as reminding, navigation, calibration, monitoring and interaction. Display mode includes a pointer, number, image and so on. The smart watch is a fitness tracker with a heart rate monitor: the smart fitness belt tracks and records your heart rate, number of steps, calories, distance, workout duration and exercise patterns such as running mode, sit up mode, skipping rope mode, table tennis mode, basketball mode, badminton mode, cycling and tennis mode. Health functions: heart rate monitoring, blood pressure monitoring, sleep monitoring (sleep time, sleep quality).
Call/message alert, social message alert, Bluetooth camera, music remote control, Dial pad for making calls, phone book, bracelet finder option, alarm. Clock setting function: raise the wrist to wake the screen, stopwatch, adjust brightness. Additional features: static reminder, remote camera shooting, media player control, alarm setting, call alert, etc. The wristband is made of a flexible and durable elastomer material, similar to that used in many sports watches. Operating temperature -10° c to 50° c. Long battery life features, If your wrist is wet or sweaty, remove the watch and dry the strap thoroughly before wearing it. The phone connects via app and Bluetooth Network mode: No Sim card available:No

name: Silicone Shockproof Back Case For Samsung Galaxy A34
description: The case offers full body protection from drops and scuffs while adding minimal bulk. Engineered with flexible, fully shock-absorbent  material that is scratch and tear resistant providing maximum impact protection for your phone from common accidents. The case also allows for easy access to the all ports and buttons through precisely aligned cut-outs. Flexible wrap-around design makes it easy snap on and off without stretching the case. The case's back finish is non-slip but easy to grip and slides easily in and out of your pocket. Its ultra-thin design makes your case feel like part of the phone.

name: Replacement Screen For Huawei Nova 3i
description:
Top quality OEM Huawei Nova 3i lcd and touchscreen replacement part, for the replacement of your broken, cracked, shattered or blind phone screen
Please note
This screen is for Huawei Nova 3i Phone
It's not the whole phone. It's just the screen.
It is not compatible with any other  Phone, Please Ensure that the phone Model is Huawei Nova 3i

Before Installation Notes
Tips 1: Test before installation When testing, do not remove any protective film or tags. Please pay attention to the problem of static electricity. Ensure you wear eye protection and use caution not to cut your finger with the glass splinters.
Tips 2: Test Properly and Extensively Screen replacement is very fragile product. We strongly suggest test before installation. Please simulates testing,which means mobile phone apart, (motherboard + LCD or screen) connected audio cable and new replacement, power on,test finished. If test OK, please install it. If it can not show, please contact us at the very first time. And please do not force it to be installed in mobile phone. We will not be responsible once the screen is installed.
Tips 3: Do not over-bend cable Please make sure LCD cable Do not over-bend. Over 90 degrees bent will cause black display.
Please Test Properly before applying gum
